attributes.action: Take action to recover money from all banks and financial institutions that have all benefitted from the governments's financial policies at the UK taxpayers expense.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All Banks and City financial institutions have benefited from our government's interventions.  As an industry these financial institutions should pay for their part in the financial mess before being allowed to make profits and pay bonuses.  These profits are effectively subsidised by UK and other tax payers.
